name: Touching Grass with Ain
description:
Hello there! This is a short VN fan game made for the character Ain from Elsword. To think my first released VN would be about him... It couldn't be better!
I hope this game brings a smile to your face :]
-------------------

There a 2 endings
-----------------
This is my first time making a web build ;-;

----------------
A game made for O2A2 VN Jam 2022!

Backstory of the title:

So originally, the game was going to be different, but then my friend called out how ironic Ain (a fictional character) was lying in grass when the term "touch grass," is to, in her words, "get of ur computer, stop simping 2d characters, and go outside." The idea was just too funny to me, so that's how the title name and plot came to be.

--------------

Story, coding done by Me!

Music: Peritune - Gentle Theme (Guitar)

Font/Text Color option Code template - Renpy GUI Template

--------------

Thank you to everyone who helped me with this (/u\)
